tokenize.from sentence: We tokenize the corpora with NLTK 2 .

pre-trained word vectors.from sentence: We use the 300 dimension pre-trained word vectors from GloVe ( Pennington , Socher , and Manning 2014 ) and we do not update them during training .

50 - dimension.from sentence: We use 50 - dimension character - level embedding vectors .

dropout.from sentence: We use dropout ) with probability 0.3 for every learnable layer .

Adam optimizer.from sentence: We use the Adam optimizer with learning rate of 0.001 and clipnorm of 5 .

out - of - vocabulary words.from sentence: The out - of - vocabulary words are initialized with zero vectors .

number of hidden units.from sentence: The number of hidden units in all the LSTMs is 150 .

multi-factor attentive encoding.from sentence: For multi-factor attentive encoding , we choose 4 factors ( m ) based on our experimental findings ( refer to ) .

training.from sentence: During training , the minibatch size is fixed at 60 .
